subSections.title: Introduction
subSections.content: At BBTECH Space, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the personal information of our users and candidates.

subSections.title: Data Collection
subSections.content: We collect personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and resume when you register on our platform or apply to a job offer.

subSections.title: Use of Information
subSections.content: We use your personal information to facilitate the recruitment process, including communication between candidates and companies, and to improve our services.

subSections.title: Sharing Information
subSections.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except as necessary for the recruitment process or when required by law.

subSections.title: Data Security
subSections.content: We take security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

subSections.title: Your Rights
subSections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information on our platform at any time.

subSections.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
subSections.content: BBTECH Space reserves the right to modify this privacy policy. Any changes will be communicated through our website.

subSections.title: Contact
subSections.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at barbi@bbtech.space.
